description: Details of noise assessment pursuant to condition 5 of planning permission ref: 242505FUL dated: 30.08.2024 for 'Conversion of a dwellinghouse into two self-contained residential units; alteration of roof from hip to gable end; rear roof extension; installation of three rooflights to front roofslope; single storey rear extension, part first floor rear extension including alteration to existing bay window; and single storey front porch extension.'
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: The submitted details of noise assessment pursuant to condition 5 of planning permission ref: 242505FUL dated: 30.08.2024, are deemed to be unsatisfactory and do not meet the requirements of the condition. The proposal would therefore fail to comply with policies 1.1 and 1.2 of the Ealing Development (Core) Strategy (2012), Policies 7A and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), Policy D14 of The London Plan (2021), Ealing SPG10 and the National Planning Policy Framework (2024).
